name: Authentication System with Temporal Workflow
description: Implementation of a new authentication system using Temporal workflows. This includes setting up auth and profile microservices (names must start with 'flock'), their respective PostgreSQL databases, a Temporal workflow service backed by ScyllaDB, and implementing the User Registration Workflow.

tasks.name: Setup Infrastructure Base
tasks.description: Set up the basic infrastructure components needed for all services
subtasks: Create Kubernetes namespace for auth system
Set up monitoring and logging infrastructure

tasks.name: Deploy Temporal Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up Temporal server and its ScyllaDB backend

tasks.name: Deploy Auth Service Database
tasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL database for auth service using CloudNativePG operator

tasks.name: Deploy Profile Service Database
tasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL database for profile service using CloudNativePG operator

tasks.name: Define Service Protocols
tasks.description: Reference existing Protocol Buffer definitions for all services and set up proto generation pipeline
subtasks: Reference auth service proto files from /proto/auth
Reference profile service proto files from /proto/profile

tasks.name: Create Auth Service Base
tasks.description: Set up the basic auth service structure and core components ensuring microservice name starts with 'flock'
subtasks: Ensure microservice name follows 'flock' prefix convention (e.g., flock-auth-service)

tasks.name: Create Profile Service Base
tasks.description: Set up the basic profile service structure and core components ensuring microservice name starts with 'flock'
subtasks: Ensure microservice name follows 'flock' prefix convention (e.g., flock-profile-service)

tasks.name: Implement Registration Workflow
tasks.description: Create the User Registration Workflow in the auth service

tasks.name: Implement Auth Service Core
tasks.description: Implement core authentication functionality including conversion between DB objects and protobuf messages
subtasks: Implement translation layer to convert DB objects to Protobuf messages and vice versa

tasks.name: Implement Profile Service Core
tasks.description: Implement core profile management functionality including conversion between DB objects and protobuf messages
subtasks: Implement translation layer to convert DB objects to Protobuf messages and vice versa

tasks.name: Implement Workflow Activities
tasks.description: Implement the activities for the User Registration Workflow

tasks.name: Create Test Suite
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing for all components
subtasks: Create unit tests for all services

tasks.name: Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy the complete system to production
